question_text: Why might a wide-gamut Adobe RGB display be inappropriate for casual web browsing or general office use?
answer_options: Web content is designed for sRGB, which may appear oversaturated on wide-gamut displays
Adobe RGB displays do not support standard resolutions
correct_answer: Web content is designed for sRGB, which may appear oversaturated on wide-gamut displays
explanation: Most web and desktop content assumes sRGB color space. A wide-gamut screen can cause colors to appear exaggerated if not managed properly.
